name: vtk-deep-core-mining
title: VortiK's Deep core mining
author: VortiK
description: Adds variation of vanilla resources to mine when ore fields are depleted with an advanced mining drill to upgrade mining outposts and provide source of expensive but steady infinite ore. Adds an high tech infinite ore mining from rare deep core cracks spawned in Nauvis that require heavy refining. Has built in automatic support for other mods Ores.
